trans-unit.source: A service behavior that allows you to configure the <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore"></xref> feature, which supports persisting state information for workflow service instances into an SQL Server 2005 or SQL Server 2008 database.
trans-unit.target: Et problem med tjenesten som lar deg konfigurere den <xref href="System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore"> </xref> -funksjonen, som støtter vedvarende tilstandsinformasjon for tjenesten arbeidsflytforekomster til en SQL Server 2005 eller SQL Server 2008-database.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"></xref> class using the connection string passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.SqlWorkflowInstanceStoreBehavior"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av tilkoblingsstrengen sendes som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: This constructor internally initializes an instance of the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore> object using the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren internt initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore>objekt ved hjelp av tilkoblingsstrengen.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore>

trans-unit.source: A connection string that refers to a SQL Server persistence database.
trans-unit.target: En tilkoblingsstreng som refererer til en SQL Server utholdenhet database.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddBindingParameters" name="AddBindingParameters" href=""></xref> method of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> interface, which allows you to pass custom data to binding elements to support contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AddBindingParameters" name="AddBindingParameters" href=""> </xref> -metoden for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"> </xref> grensesnittet som gjør det mulig å sende tilpassede data til binding elementer å støtte kontrakten implementering.

trans-unit.source: The service description of the service.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: Verten for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Service-endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Custom objects to which binding elements have access.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinert objekter som bindingen elementer har tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplyDispatchBehavior" name="ApplyDispatchBehavior" href=""></xref> method of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"></xref> interface that allows you to change run-time property values or insert custom extension objects such as error handlers, message or parameter inspectors, security extensions, and other custom extension objects.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_ApplyDispatchBehavior" name="ApplyDispatchBehavior" href=""> </xref> -metoden for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior"> </xref> grensesnitt som lar deg endre kjøretid egenskapsverdier eller sette inn egendefinert utvidelse objekter som feil behandlingsprogrammer, melding eller parameteren inspeksjoner, utvidelser for sikkerhet og andre egendefinert utvidelse-objekter.

trans-unit.source: Description of the service.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The host of the service.
trans-unit.target: Verten for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string used to connect to persistence database.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilkoblingsstrengen som brukes til å koble til utholdenhet database.

trans-unit.source: The connection string.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.HostLockRenewalPeriod*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the interval within which a host must renew its lock on an instance before the lock expires.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir intervallet som vert må fornye låsing på en forekomst før låsen utløper.

trans-unit.source: If the host does not renew the lock in the specified time period, the instance is unlocked and another host can obtain the lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verten ikke fornyes låsen i den angitte tidsperioden, forekomsten er låst og låsing på forekomsten kan få tak i en annen vert.

trans-unit.source: The specified time period before the instance is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte tidsperioden før forekomsten er låst opp.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceCompletionAction*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the instance state information is kept in the persistence database after the instance is completed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om forekomsten statusinformasjon beholdes i databasen utholdenhet etter at forekomsten er fullført.

trans-unit.source: Keeping instances after completion causes the persistence database to grow rapidly and this affects the performance of the database.
trans-unit.target: Holde forekomster etter fullføring fører utholdenhet-databasen for å øke raskt, og dette har innvirkning på ytelsen til databasen.

trans-unit.source: You should configure a database purge policy to delete these records periodically to ensure that the performance of the database is at the level that satisfy your performance requirements.
trans-unit.target: Du må konfigurere en policy for databasen tømming av Hvis du vil slette disse oppføringene regelmessig for å sikre at ytelsen til databasen er på nivå som oppfyller ytelseskravene til.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance state information is kept in the persistence database; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forekomsten tilstandsinformasjon beholdes i utholdenhet-databasen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceEncodingOption*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the instance state information is compressed using the GZip algorithm before the information is saved in the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om forekomsten statusinformasjon er komprimert med algoritmen GZip før informasjonen er lagret i vedvarende lager.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instance state information is compressed using the GZip algorithm; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forekomsten tilstandsinformasjon er komprimert med algoritmen GZip; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.InstanceLockedExceptionAction*>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies what action a service host should take when it receives an <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref> when the host tries to lock an instance because the instance is currently locked by another host.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hvilken handling som en Tjenesteverten skal utføres når den mottar en <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"> </xref> når verten prøver å låse en forekomst fordi forekomsten er låst av en annen vert.

trans-unit.source: The options allowed for this field are: None, Basic Retry, and Aggressive Retry.
trans-unit.target: Alternativene som er tillatt for dette feltet er: None, Basic prøv på nytt, og konkurransedyktig på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The default value is None.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er None.

trans-unit.source: The following list provides you with the descriptions for these three options: - None.
trans-unit.target: Følgende liste gir deg beskrivelser for disse tre alternativer:-None.

trans-unit.source: The service host does not attempt to lock the instance and passes the <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException> to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten ikke kunne låse forekomsten og går det <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>til oppkalleren.</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>

trans-unit.source: - Basic Retry.
trans-unit.target: – Grunnleggende prøv på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The service host reattempts to lock the instance with a linear retry interval and passes the exception to the caller at the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten reattempts å låse forekomst med et intervall på lineære prøv på nytt, og sender unntaket til oppkalleren på slutten av sekvensen.

trans-unit.source: - Aggressive Retry.
trans-unit.target: -Grundig prøv på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The service host reattempts to lock the instance with an exponentially increasing delay and passes the <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException> to the caller at the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten reattempts å låse forekomsten med en eksponentielt økende forsinkelse og går det <xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>til oppkalleren på slutten av sekvensen.</xref:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException>

trans-unit.source: The action a service host should take when receiving a <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Handlingen en Tjenesteverten tar under mottak av en <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet tilkoblingsforsøk SQL.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 4.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the maximum number of SQL connection retries.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer det maksimale antallet tilkoblingsforsøk SQL.

trans-unit.source: Promotes properties that can be used in queries.
trans-unit.target: Hever egenskapene som kan brukes i spørringer.

trans-unit.source: The promoted properties are the properties that you can use in queries to retrieve instances.
trans-unit.target: De forfremmede er egenskaper som kan brukes i spørringer skal hente forekomster.

trans-unit.source: These property can be of simple type (int32, string, bool and so on), which is represented by a variant or binary.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan være enkel type (int32, string, bool og så videre) som er representert av en Variant-type eller binary.

trans-unit.source: Name of the promotion.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på kampanjen.

trans-unit.source: The names of variables that must be promoted as variants.
trans-unit.target: Navn på variabler som må forfremmes som varianter.

trans-unit.source: The names of variables that must be promoted as binary data.
trans-unit.target: Navn på variabler som må forfremmes som binære data.

trans-unit.source: Binary data is typically used to store tracking information.
trans-unit.target: Binærdata brukes vanligvis til å lagre sporingsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Activities.DurableInstancing.SqlWorkflowInstanceStore.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor lang tid etter som kjører SQL arbeidsflyten forekomsten Store deloppgave registrering for å finne ut alle runnable eller activatable arbeidsflytforekomster i databasen utholdenhet etter forrige syklus for registrering.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for tidsintervallet.

trans-unit.source: Inspects the service host and the service description to confirm that the service can run successfully.
trans-unit.target: Undersøker Tjenesteverten og tjenestebeskrivelsen for å bekrefte at tjenesten kan kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The description of the service.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The host for the service.
trans-unit.target: Verten for tjenesten.
